data.title: Digital Game Factory company
data.meta_description: In the summer 2011 Digital Game Factory Limited was founded by Charlie Andre-Barrett. Charlie Andre-Barrett to act as Founder & Managing Director of a stand alone business unit to focus on the Digital business category. To offer strategic partners –...
data.text:
In the summer 2011 Digital Game Factory Limited was founded by Charlie Andre-Barrett. Charlie Andre-Barrett to act as Founder & Managing Director of a stand alone business unit to focus on the Digital business category. To offer strategic partners – Digital Start up consultancy. Digital Game Factory Limited plans to offer publishers and Developers digital distribution onto the major global ESD Digital Players on a global basis. Providing selected Affiliate label partners access the ESD Global Digital category.

The company you are trying to view is not available on IndieDB. Only publishers and developers which have games, mods and other content released on IndieDB are listed. View Digital Game Factory on ModDB.

Continue browsing the company list, to find the profile you are after.
